channel.title: Authors on Human-Animal Interactions group
channel.description: Recent content in Authors on Human-Animal Interactions group

item.description:
We are a group of CNRS and EPHE researchers working at CEFE at the interface of ecology, modelling and social sciences. HAIR is for Human-Animal InteRactions ðŸ˜„ In particular, we investigate:

  • Management of exploiteddd and/or protected animal populations
  • Interactions between humans and animals and socio-ecological systems
  • Transfer of knowledge (courses, workshops)
